
A really small dispatch message core designed for asynchronous running in a single thread (e.g., event loop, asyncio in python, etc).


# Full Live Cycle

- Planning and Design
- Development and Implementation
- Testing and Quality Assurance
- Deployment and Maintenance

# Features

- managing dependencies.
- tasks automation.
- code generation.
- code formatting.
- code linting.
- code refactoring.
- code testing.
- code documentation.
- code deployment.
